title: Dark Web
description: An encrypted part of the internet not indexed by search engines and needs specific authorization to access

title: Login And Go
description: A procedure that enables an entity to access a secure system such as an operating system, application, service, website or other resource

title: Password Login
description: A secret combination of characters that identify a user and grant access to a specific device or website

title: 2FA authentication
description: a security process in which users provide two different authentication factors to verify themselves.
